name: Jetdocs
headline: Collaborative ticketing that integrates into Teams and Slack
description:
Jetdocs is a collaborative ticketing solution that is integrated into Microsoft Teams and Slack. We allow teams to create no-code workflows that digitize your processes and connect your teams.

We empower IT and Ops teams with the interface, as well as the ability to build out workflows to handle internal tickets, requests and approvals. We eliminate the problems of bloated email chains, group inboxes and long messaging threads.

founders.name: Andrew Dolinski, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO at Jetdocs. Previously Co-founder and COO at Clutch.ca, the first modern car buying solution in Canada.

founders.name: Alex Kovalev, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CTO at Jetdocs. Full stack web developer. Previously held positions at Ritual, Top Hat and Twitter.

Manage Cookie Consent
To provide the best experiences, we use technologies like cookies (üç™) to store/access info. Consenting will allow us to process data to make your experience better. Not consenting or withdrawing consent, may affect certain features and functions.
Functional Functional Always active 
The technical storage or access is strictly necessary for the legitimate purpose of enabling the use of a specific service explicitly requested by the subscriber or user, or for the sole purpose of carrying out the transmission of a communication over an electronic communications network.
Preferences Preferences
The technical storage or access is necessary for the legitimate purpose of storing preferences that are not requested by the subscriber or user.
Statistics Statistics
The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for statistical purposes. The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for anonymous statistical purposes. Without a subpoena, voluntary compliance on the part of your Internet Service Provider, or additional records from a third party, information stored or retrieved for this purpose alone cannot usually be used to identify you.
Marketing Marketing
The technical storage or access is required to create user profiles to send advertising, or to track the user on a website or across several websites for similar marketing purposes.

Jetdocs: Seamless Team Collaboration
# Streamline Operations Across Teams with Integrated, Scalable Workflows
Replace Legacy Tools with a Unified Platform that Enhances Collaboration, Scales Efficiently, and Drives Automation Across Operations, IT, Sales, HR and Implementation.
[Request Demo üóìÔ∏è](https://jetdocs.io/<#>) [Get Started‚ö°](https://jetdocs.io/<#>)
### Smart Form Builder & Catalog
Create dynamic and conditional forms that capture the right data, every time.
### Advanced Ticketing System
Manage complex workflows with customizable SLAs, workflow steps and approvals.
### Intelligent Queue and Hub
Optimize task distribution and have oversight with custom Views.
### Microsoft Teams, Slack and Web
Integrate with and extend your existing platforms for enhanced collaboration.
### Powerful Analytics
Understand your business and teams with actionable insights and comprehensive reporting.
### Flexible Data Handling
Ingest text data Jetdocs Forms, External Sources, Email and more. Push Jetdocs data anywhere.
Trusted by leading brands and organizations around the world

What to Expect with Jetdocs
  * Standardize your workflows
  * Reduce resolution times
  * Increase transparency, reduce silos

  * Custom views to manage teams
  * One-click integrations

  * ![Apps Icon](https://jetdocs.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/zap_icon.svg) Push to 3000+ Apps 
  * ![Flows Icon](https://jetdocs.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/zap_icon.svg) Events like Create, Complete, Comment etc. 
  * ![Automation Icon](https://jetdocs.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/zap_icon.svg) Quick Configuration 

No-Code

Technical
![Erik Finch](https://jetdocs.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/erik-f-3.png)
"When we came across Jetdocs I just had this eureka moment. This is exactly what we're looking for because it's simple, it's approachable, it's customizable and it doesn't have a big overhead."
Erik Finch
Director Global Operations, Boundless Immigration
Ticket Hub Catalog Builder Roles Notifications
![Jetdocs Ticket Hub](https://jetdocs.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Jetdocs-Homepage-2.png)
### Ticket Hub
Never miss another item. Fully customizable to suit your day-to-day needs:
  * Unified Inbox for all relevant tickets, approvals and issues
  * Intelligent Views based on custom filters, columns and tags
  * Real-time collaboration on complex tickets
  * Advanced Export based on your own custom Views


![Jetdocs Catalog](https://jetdocs.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Catalog-Redesign-5.jpg)
### Catalog
One central location for end-users
  * Fully-customizable Catalog with Categories and Templates
  * Receive structured data for repeatable processes
  * Save tickets as Drafts and Bookmark common Templates
  * Quickly duplicate tickets with New from Recent


![Jetdocs Builder](https://jetdocs.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/catalog-builder.png)
### Builder
Get set up in minutes with the no-code Catalog Builder 
  * Custom form creation with various input field types
  * Conditional logic and dynamic form behavior
  * Conditional workflow steps based on submitted values
  * Dozens of advanced features like Who Else is Involved, Subtasks and more


![Jetdocs Roles](https://jetdocs.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/usergroups-jetdocs.png)
### Roles and Users
Manage user permissions and access control effortlessly
  * Various user roles and permissions (Admin, Editor, Manager, Member)
  * Automatically or Manually add users to Jetdocs Workspaces
  * Create User Groups and leverage them in workflows
  * Audit trails for all role, data and event changes


![Jetdocs Notifications](https://jetdocs.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/notifications-jetdocs-2.png)
### Notifications
Keep everyone informed with intelligent notifications
  * Custom notifications based on different event types
  * Multi-channel notifications (email, bot)
  * Daily Summary notifications based on your own custom Views
  * @Mention users directly for specific questions


## Implement Productivity
### Before Jetdocs
  * ‚úó Fragmented communication across multiple platforms
  * ‚úó Slow response times leading to customer dissatisfaction
  * ‚úó Manual data entry prone to errors and inconsistencies
  * ‚úó Difficulty tracking project progress and team performance
  * ‚úó Limited visibility into cross-departmental workflows
  * ‚úó Time-consuming report generation and data analysis


![Jetdocs Logo](https://jetdocs.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/jetdocs-250w.png)
  * ‚úì Centralized communication hub for seamless collaboration
  * ‚úì Improved customer and employee satisfaction with improved resolution times of 45% to 60%
  * ‚úì Standardized data collection, resolution workflows and improvement cycles
  * ‚úì Real-time project tracking and performance analytics
  * ‚úì Transparent cross-departmental processes and collaboration
  * ‚úì Instant access to customizable reports and insights


## Transform Your Workflow with Jetdocs
Experience the power of seamless collaboration and efficiency in your organization
Set up in minutes
Reduce resolution times by 45-60%
[Book Your Free Demo](https://jetdocs.io/<#>)
√ó
## Which department?
Operations 
IT 
Legal 
Human Resources 
Finance 
Marketing 
Sales 
Customer Service 
Procurement 
Compliance 
## What functionality do you care about most?
Select all that apply
### Centralized Catalog
Submitters can view all templates in one location
### No-Code Builder
Quickly create templates
### Multi-Step Workflows
Touch multiple people and reduce silos
### SLAs
Ensure our organization is resolving issues on time
### Audit Logs
Comments, feedback and changes are accurately tracked
### Analytics
Provide data and insights into organizational performance
## How do you want to ingest data?
### Internal Workflow Forms
Jetdocs Catalog. For example, IT, Internal Operations, Legal etc.
### External Workflow Forms
Jetdocs External Portal. For example, structured data from customer or subsidiary outside Teams/Slack environment.
### External Data Source
API Endpoint or Zapier to Jetdocs Template. For example, email, 3rd party SaaS platform or text.
üí°
FYI: In all options above, Jetdocs supports Zapier/API to push data to any other system.
## I want to try Jetdocs'
### Microsoft Teams Integration
Bot and email notifications for seamless collaboration.
### Slack Integration
Bot and email notifications for real-time updates.
### Standalone Web Application
Access via browser with email notifications.
## Optional: Describe a workflow you're looking to build
üí°
We'll use this information to help customize your environment for you!
## What's your email?
We'll send you a 7-day magic link to your customized environment!
Previous Next
## Thank You!
We're working on creating your custom environment and magic link. We'll email you this as soon as it's created.
Close

## How do you want to ingest data?
### Internal Workflow Forms
Jetdocs Catalog. For example, IT, Internal Operations, Legal etc.
### External Workflow Forms
Jetdocs External Portal. For example, structured data from customer or subsidiary outside Teams/Slack environment.
### External Data Source
API Endpoint or Zapier to Jetdocs Template. For example, email, 3rd party SaaS platform or text.

generated_description:
Jetdocs is a dynamic startup founded in 2020, right out of Y Combinator's W21 batch, and it‚Äôs gearing up to change the game for collaborative ticketing. Based in Toronto, Canada, and sporting a lean team of just two, Jetdocs is tackling the issue of chaotic communication within organizations by integrating ticketing solutions directly into Microsoft Teams and Slack.

The company's mission is crystal clear: simplify internal communications. Instead of the traditional tangled web of email threads, group inboxes, and lengthy messaging discussions, Jetdocs empowers IT and Ops teams to create no-code workflows. These workflows are designed to automate and streamline processes, allowing teams to efficiently manage internal tickets, requests, and approvals. It‚Äôs all about reducing the clutter and increasing the clarity of team interactions.

Jetdocs boasts several powerful features, including a smart form builder, an advanced ticketing system with customizable service level agreements (SLAs), and intelligent task distribution through custom views. By allowing teams to operate out of their existing platforms like Teams and Slack, Jetdocs ensures that organizations can maintain their workflow without disrupting their established tech stack.

Their offering is a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) solution, and it‚Äôs already being trusted by a mix of notable clients, from Fortune 500 companies to educational institutions and non-profits. The ease of setup and versatility of features helps organizations significantly reduce their resolution times by an impressive 45-60%.

In essence, Jetdocs is here to tackle the growing need for streamlined collaboration and efficient workflows. With their no-code integration capabilities, businesses can quickly adopt Jetdocs to transform their ticketing processes without the overhead typically associated with such changes.

For more insights on how Jetdocs can redefine team collaboration, check out their website at [Jetdocs.io](https://jetdocs.io).
